column2: Unlocks the ability for characters on your account to change the method of sending mail to other players as well as changing how mail from the game is delivered.

Page Two: Studying the Orrian gorillas.
<c=@abilitytype>Corruption.</c> Become a virulent cloud and inflict multiple conditions on foes you touch. Entering this form removes spectral effects. Inflict bleeding on yourself.
Chest[s] of the Crystal Desert Hero

Available for a limited time.

Change the appearance of any existing greatsword. This will also unlock the skin for your account wardrobe.

Trader Berjas just told me you were able to help our traders. Thank you so much! Trading is so important to the ranch. If we didn't give them the supplies we promised, they would have been pretty upset with us.

Hop by anytime to purchase more springer treats.

—Unja
If you need help, click the button below to contact our Customer Support team.

Double-click to open. Contains 1 Drop of Liquid Karma and 5 Trade Contracts.

I've received the items from my operatives, and I have you to thank for that. With this information, we'll be a stronger and more efficient force against our enemies.

I wish you and your jackal safe travels in the future. Remember, come by anytime to purchase more jackal treats from me.

—Drojkor, Spirit Squall
Given by Merchant Ket'abatchk at Brightwater Inlet for delivering his shipment and recovering his bag of shinies.
Page Three: Atop an ancient citadel.
Given by Stablemaster Unja in Highjump Ranch for talking to her about helping the local traders.
